body: Another day another instance where chaldea is saved with the power of sex from a primordial dragon fragment.
Another day of Melusine feeling lonely and the looming destruction of Chaldea then it gets saved by seggs

A remnant of 4 billion years old grand dragon VS 18 yrs old boy. That's pedo for her, I think? And how come Guda doesn't have time for Melusine? If she's NP3++ then isn't it easier to just use her and farming 24/7 rather than anyone else? But instead asking in hentai, just keep more her doujins coming! lol
